text:
It shall be unlawful for a landlord to increase the amount of rent for any vacated unit pursuant to this chapter, except as otherwise permitted by 
Chapter 37 of the San Francisco Administrative Code. 
(Added by Ord. 400-96, App. 10/21/96; amended by Ord. 99-04, File No. 031992, App. 6/4/2004)

heading.catch_text: RENT INCREASES DURING LEAD HAZARD WORK.
